remarks: If ` B ` is finer than ` A ` and ` S ` is an element of ` A ` , every point in ` S ` is an element of a subset of ` S ` which is in ` B ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)
statement:
fnessex $p |- ( ( A Fne B /\ S e. A /\ P e. S ) -> E. x e. B ( P e. x /\ x C_ S ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d P x $.
$d S x $.
